name: John F. Kennedy Dr
description: A stretch of John F. Kennedy Drive, briefly enlivened by teenage activity. You are on John F. Kennedy Dr. A group of teenagers are gathered on a nearby lawn, their music a tinny counterpoint to the quiet hum of the neighborhood. They are a fleeting burst of energy in the otherwise languid afternoon. John F. Kennedy Dr continues its quiet descent to the north and south, a ribbon of asphalt winding through neatly trimmed lawns and a few houses that have seen better decades. The air is still, broken only by the distant hum of traffic and the occasional chirping of a bird, oblivious to the subtle decay.
